document_title: Hydatid disease: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_name: san-lon-gao.json_3_Symptoms and signs of rice tapeworm infection
subsection_content: People with rice tapeworm often have no symptoms or mild symptoms such as: sometimes abdominal pain, intermittent diarrhea, pain spreading to the appendix due to the tapeworm moving from the small intestine to the large intestine, nausea, headache, weight loss. , some cases of seizures, cardiovascular disorders, increased intracranial pressure.
subsection_title: san lon gao.json. Symptoms and signs of rice tapeworm infection
subsection_data:
san lon gao.json. Symptoms and signs of rice tapeworm infection
People with rice tapeworm often have no symptoms or mild symptoms such as: sometimes abdominal pain, intermittent diarrhea, pain spreading to the appendix due to the tapeworm moving from the small intestine to the large intestine, nausea, headache, weight loss. , some cases of seizures, cardiovascular disorders, increased intracranial pressure.
